Replace.Text: Cannot declare war or start a raid war on a city-state. Cannot start a raid war on Luna
Cannot declare war or start a raid war on a city-state. Cannot start a raid war on Luna

The Deer Pack has the ability to cultivate deer resources. When a Deer Park is built, it provides +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +1 [ICON_Science] Science, and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for each deer resource in the current city. Deer resources obtained through cultivation cannot be increased after building a Deer Park. Removing the increased resources and landforms will increase the output by -100%.

When a Deer Park is built, it provides +2 [ICON_FAITH] Faith, +1 [ICON_Science] Science, and +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture for each deer resource in the current city. Deer resources obtained through cultivation cannot be increased after building a Deer Park. Removing the increased resources and landforms will increase the output by -100%.

Fawn Unique Civilian Unit, Replaces the Builder, -1 [ICON_Charges] Labor but cheaper to build, has +1 [ICON_Movement] Movement, can be purchased with [ICON_FAITH] Faith in cities with Fawn Parks, cannot be captured by other units

The Little Deer Specialty Cultural Relics Area replaces the Theater Square and is cheaper to build. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] Adjacent Little Deer Park +4 [ICON_Culture] Culture, each adjacent City Center +1 additional [ICON_Culture] Culture, each adjacent Wonder, Amusement Facility and Water Park +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture, provides additional [ICON_GreatMusician] Great Musician points

Unlocks the ability to build the Deer Park in the Deer Pack. [NEWLINE][NEWLINE] +1 [ICON_Culture] Culture, +2 [ICON_FOOD] Food, +2 [ICON_Production] Productivity, +4 [ICON_GOLD] Gold, +2 [ICON_HOUSING] Housing, +2 [ICON_AMENITIES] Amenities; +4 [ICON_Culture] Culture if adjacent to Hanayori Women's Dormitory; +2 [ICON_Culture] Culture if adjacent to other featured areas, [ICON_Culture] Culture provides [ICON_Tourism] Tourism, only one per city, +2 Amazing
Luna's unique city center building, which is built in all cities, and has 2 [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music great work slots
Luna's unique city center building, which is built in all cities, and has 2 [ICON_GreatWork_Music] music great work slots
Description of the game Deer Bag
Description of Hanayose Girls' Dormitory in the game

Kano is a well-known Japanese voice actor and singer who rose to fame in the early 21st century. She is known worldwide for her unique healing voice and outstanding musical talent. Her singing is praised as "the sound of nature" and can soothe the hearts of listeners. From her initial online submissions to her later professional music production, she has demonstrated extraordinary artistic talent and perseverance. Now, she will lead this civilization centered on music and culture to write a new chapter in history.
